P-4 P426 Nissan Skyline GT-R (R34) 2000 JGTC Series GT500 Class 8th/11th/22nd Place M. Krumm/U. Katayama/Y. Ide



The technical regulations of the JGTC were changed substantially for 2000. Electronic driver aid systems such as ABS were banned and more severe restrictions on engines in general were applied with air restrictors. The Castrol NISMO GT-R driven by Michael Krumm, Ukyo Katayama, & Yuji Ide (round 1 only) won the All-Star Sepang round, the first JGTC race organized outside Japan.
